metadata.title: CVE-2016-0825 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Widevine Trusted Application in Android 6.0.1 before 2016-03-01 allowsattackers to obtain sensitive TrustZone secure-storage information byleveraging kernel access, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature orSignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 20860039.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

android - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-copyright - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-emulator - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-images - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-runtime - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: android package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20160307-0742-0ubuntu3').
